segments.text: This indoor kitchen draws my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a tidy yard and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her dress dries the dish carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water floods out, drenching the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Clean bowls and plates are stacked aside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the wobbly stool grabs from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaches up, eager for a piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors frame their sneaky act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool might give way any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Possible slips on the wet floor worry me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden highlights the inner turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR
